Class ABMActivityLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • logging.ABMActivityLog

    kellerke

                      int strat,
                      java.util.List<Activity> currentActivity,
                      java.util.List<Activity> MPSelectedActivity,
                      java.lang.Double MP_Incomes)
        Constructor for the CSV Log
        Parameters:
        allActivities - :: full set of activities
        farmId - :: ID of the farm
        year - :: time period
        strat - :: strategy
        currentActivity - :: current activity(ies) in system
        MPSelectedActivity - :: best activity from the MP model
        MP_Incomes - :: income of agent at time period
        modelName - :: string name of agent

    • Method Detail

      • appendLogFile

        public void appendLogFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                          boolean averagePrice)
        write output CSV log file based on decision object. This log file can be updated each time period for each agent. Does a number of checks to see what size of information is being printed to ensure we do not write more than is useful.
        Parameters:
        fileName - ::output file which is previously checked to ensure we will not exceed 1 million lines of data.
        averagePrice - :: boolean to indicate which log file to write to
